text: Does someone else has this problem with Core Web Vitals?

Are you displaying a background image on that h1 using CSS?

Is it maybe being displayed really large?
No :disappointed: but i don't know why it has a span inside

<span id="hs_cos_wrapper_name" class="hs_cos_wrapper hs_cos_wrapper_meta_field hs_cos_wrapper_type_text" style="" data-hs-cos-general-type="meta_field" data-hs-cos-type="text">¿Cómo es la cobertura de Oncovital para cáncer de estómago?</span>
